sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Christ the perfect pattern, of a Christian's practice, being the substance of severall sermons, about the Imitation of Christ. / Preached by the reverend and faithfull minister of Jesus Christ, Mr. Ralph Robinson, late minister of Mary Wolnoth London. Published by Sim. Ash, Wil. Taylor, Sam. Clarke. Robinson, Ralph, 1614-1655.
[8], 271, [1], 272-284, [1] p.
Printed by J.S. and are to be sold by John Sims, at the Crosse-Keys in the new buildings in Pauls Church-yard, London, : 1658.
With a half-title printed vertically: Christ the perfect pattern. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Published by Sim. Ash, Wil. Taylor, Sam. Clarke. Robinson, Ralph, 1614-1655.
[8], 271, [1], 272-284, [1] p.
Printed by J.S. and are to be sold by John Sims, at the Crosse-Keys in the new buildings in Pauls Church-yard, London, : 1658.
With a half-title printed vertically: Christ the perfect pattern. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
John Sims

the Crosse-Keys in the new buildings in Pauls Church-yard
